 { About RTFM Please Ltd. }

We provide the full lifecycle of services for developer-focused marketing - from empowering internal engineering groups to tell your engineering story, through improved developer experience of products. I love to work with early-stage startups that need developer-focused marketing, while still remaining lean and within growth targets, to crystalize technical stories for technology consumers.
